Settings.Name: Draw Mouse
Settings.Description: Specify whether to draw the mouse pointer. Enabled by default.

Settings.Name: Framerate
Settings.Description: Set the grabbing frame rate. Default value is ntsc, corresponding to a frame rate of 30000/1001.

Settings.Name: Show Region
Settings.Description: Show grabbed region on screen. Enabled by default.

Settings.Name: Video Size
Settings.Description: Set the video frame size. The default is to capture the full screen if desktop is selected, or the full window size if title='window title' is selected.

Settings.Name: Window Title
Settings.Description: Set the title of a specific window to capture. By default the whole desktop will be recorded.

Settings.Name: Offset X
Settings.Description: When capturing a region with video size, set the distance from the left edge of the screen or desktop.

Settings.Name: Offset Y
Settings.Description: When capturing a region with video size, set the distance from the top edge of the screen or desktop.

Settings.Name: Image Format
Settings.Description: The image format the screenshot will be saved in.
